title: Analysis of the effectiveness of hygiene measures and COVID-19 vaccination at a tertiary-care university hospital during the first two years of the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Valentin Niekrens, Bernd Kunz, Markus Werner, Giuseppe Valenza, Christof Seggewies, Christian Bogdan, Jan Esse
